name: .EL8
summary: Learn about .EL8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can play back the virtual classroom recording an EL8 file contains in the Windows and macOS versions of Electa Live. You cannot play EL8 files in the mobile (Android, iOS) versions of Electa Live.
To play an EL8 file, download and install Electa Live on your PC and then double-click the file. The video your EL8 file contains will begin playing in Electa Live.
